name: Right Race: Just turn right and drive
name_original: Right Race: Just turn right and drive
description:
🏁This is right racing. All that is necessary is to turn right, touching screen in any place!

🎮Collect points and compete with your friends. 
🏆Take places in the leaderboard. 
💪Compete against each other, using a two-player mode. 

At your disposal: 
🔶Several racing tracks. 
🚗Different cars.

🔜🔶Soon! New race tracks and cars! More drive.
